fw.name: Drafting2DLInterfaces

enum.name: CatClippingFrameReframeOnMode
enum.abstract: At creation of a view the clipping frame is reframed on.

enum.name: CatDedicatedFilterType
enum.abstract: Specifies if the dedicated filter mask or not the background.

enum.name: CatViewBackgroundMode
enum.abstract: The way the background of a view is displayed at creation.

enum.name: CatViewFilterCreationMode
enum.abstract: At creation of a view, this enum defines how the filter of this view is configured.

enum.name: CatViewSide
enum.abstract: CatViewSide is used in conjonction with a reference View2DL and a ViewBox.

method.name: Create2DLayout
method.abstract: Create the <tt>2DLayout</tt> associated to the 3D mechanical feature tha implement this interface.

class.name: Layout2DRoot
class.abstract: Interface to manage the 2D Layout root.

method.name: reorder_Sheets
method.abstract: Changes the positions of the sheets in this drawing according to the given ordered list.

method.name: ActiveSheet
method.abstract: Retrieves or sets the active sheet of the layout.

method.name: Parameters
method.abstract: Returns the collection of parameters of the layout.

method.name: Relations
method.abstract: Returns the collection of relations of the part document.

method.name: RenderingMode
method.abstract: Set/Get the rendering mode of Layout2D.

method.name: Sheets
method.abstract: Returns the collection of Layout2D sheets of the part document.

method.name: Standard
method.abstract: Returns or sets the DrawingStandard of the part document.

method.name: VisuIn3D
method.abstract: Set/Get the 3D visualization mode of the layout in the 3D Viewer ie in the 3D windows and in the background of each view in every 2D context.

class.name: Layout2DSettingAtt
class.abstract: The interface to access a CATIA2DLSettingAtt.

method.name: GetActivate2DModeInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves environment informations for the Activate2DMode parameter.

method.name: GetBackClippingPlaneInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves environment informations for the BackClippingPlane parameter.

method.abstract: Returns the Boundaries2DLColor parameter.

method.abstract: Retrieves environment informations for the default render style parameter.

method.abstract: Retrieves environment informations for the ProtectedElementsColor parameter.

method.abstract: Retrieves environment informations for the ViewBackgroundMode parameter.

method.name: GetViewFilterCreationModeInfo
method.abstract: Retrieves environment informations for the ViewFilterCreationMode parameter.

method.abstract: Locks or unlocks the BackClippingPlane parameter.

method.name: SetBoundaries2DLColor
method.abstract: Sets the Boundaries2DLColor parameter.

method.name: SetBoundaries2DLColorLock
method.abstract: Locks or unlocks the Boundaries2DLColor parameter.

method.name: Activate2DMode
method.abstract: Returns the Activate2DMode parameter.

method.name: BackClippingPlane
method.abstract: Returns the BackClippingPlane parameter.

method.name: Boundaries2DLDisplay
method.abstract: Returns the Boundaries2DLDisplay parameter.

method.name: Boundaries2DLLineType
method.abstract: Returns the Boundaries2DLLineType parameter.

method.name: Boundaries2DLThickness
method.abstract: Returns the Boundaries2DLThickness parameter.

method.name: CalloutCreationDialogBox
method.abstract: Returns the CalloutCreationDialogBox parameter.

method.name: CalloutCreationInActiveView
method.abstract: Returns the CalloutCreationInActiveView parameter.

method.abstract: Returns the ClippingFrameReframeOnMode parameter.

method.name: LayoutDefaultRenderStyle
method.abstract: Returns the default render style attribute value to apply to a Layout at its creation parameter.

method.name: PropagateHighlight

method.name: ViewBackgroundMode
method.abstract: Returns the ViewBackgroundMode parameter.

method.name: ViewFilterCreationMode

class.name: Layout2DSheet
class.abstract: The interface to access a Layout2D Sheet.

method.name: Activate
method.abstract: Activates the Layout2D sheet.

method.name: IsDetail
method.abstract: Checks whether the sheet is a detail sheet.

method.name: PrintOut
method.abstract: Prints the Layout2D sheet according to its page setup on the default printer.

method.name: PrintOut2
method.abstract: Prints the Layout2D sheet according to its page setup on the default printer.

method.name: PrintToFile
method.abstract: Prints the Layout2D sheet according its page setup in a file instead of being sent to a printer.

method.name: PrintToFile2
method.abstract: Prints the Layout2D sheet according its page setup in a file instead of being sent to a printer.

method.name: reorder_Views
method.abstract: Changes the positions of the views in this sheet according to the given ordered list.

method.name: Orientation
method.abstract: Returns or sets the paper orientation.

method.name: PageSetup
method.abstract: Returns the page setup.

method.name: PaperHeight
method.abstract: Gets or Sets the paper width of the layout sheet.

method.name: PaperName
method.abstract: Returns or sets the paper format name.

method.name: PaperSize
method.abstract: Returns or sets the paper size.

method.name: PaperWidth
method.abstract: Gets or Sets the paper width of the layout sheet.

method.name: PrintArea
method.abstract: Returns the print area definition object.

method.name: ProjectionMethod
method.abstract: Returns or sets the sheet projection mode .

method.name: SheetScale
method.abstract: Returns or sets the scale of the Layout2D sheet.

method.name: Views
method.abstract: Returns the Layout2D view collection of the Layout2D sheet.

method.name: VisuIn3D
method.abstract: Set/Get the 3D visualization mode of the sheet in the 3D Viewer ie in the 3D windows and in the background of each view in every 2D context.

class.name: Layout2DSheets
class.abstract: A collection of all the Layout sheets 2DL currently managed by the LayoutRoot.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates a Layout sheet and adds it to the Layout2DSheets collection.

method.name: AddDetail
method.abstract: Creates a detail Layout sheet 2DL and adds it to the LayoutSheets2DL collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a Layout sheet using its index or its name from the Layout2DSheets collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a Layout2Dsheet from the Layout2DSheets collection.

method.name: ActiveSheet
method.abstract: Returns the active Layout sheet of the Layout document.

class.name: Layout2DView
class.abstract: The interface to access a Layout2D View.

method.name: Activate
method.abstract: Activates the Layout2D view.

method.name: AlignedWithReferenceView
method.abstract: Activates the alignment with the reference view.

method.name: GetViewName
method.abstract: Returns the prefix, the ident and the suffix of the name of the Layout2D view.

method.name: SaveEdition
method.abstract: Saves the Sketch Edition.

method.name: SetViewName
method.abstract: Sets the prefix, the ident and the suffix of the name of the Layout2D view.

method.name: Size
method.abstract: Returns the bounding box of the Layout2D view.

method.name: UnAlignedWithReferenceView
method.abstract: Deactivates the alignment with the reference view.

method.name: Angle
method.abstract: Returns or sets the angle of the Layout2D view.

method.name: Arrows
method.abstract: Returns the drawing arrow collection of the Layout2D view.

method.name: Components
method.abstract: Returns the Layout2D component instances collection (i.

method.name: Dimensions
method.abstract: Returns the drawing dimension collection of the Layout2D view.

method.name: Factory2D
method.abstract: Returns the 2D factory of the Layout2D view.

method.name: FrameVisualization
method.abstract: Returns or sets the Layout2D view frame visualization state.

method.name: GeometricElements
method.abstract: Returns the collection of geometric elements included in the Layout2D view sketch.

method.name: LockStatus
method.abstract: Returns or sets the lock status of a Layout2D view.

method.name: Pictures
method.abstract: Returns the drawing picture collection of the Layout2D view.

method.name: ReferenceView
method.abstract: Returns or sets the reference view.

method.name: Tables
method.abstract: Returns the drawing table collection of the drawing view.

method.name: Texts
method.abstract: Returns the drawing text collection of the Layout2D view.

method.name: Threads
method.abstract: Returns the drawing thread collection of the Layout2D view.

method.name: ViewScale
method.abstract: Returns or sets the scale of the Layout2D view.

method.name: Visu2DMode
method.abstract: Sets/Gets the 2D mode for background visualization of the view.

method.name: VisuBackground
method.abstract: Sets/Gets the 2D-3D background visu mode of the view ie in the 3D windows and in the background of each view in every 2D context.

method.name: VisuIn3D
method.abstract: Sets/Gets the 3D visualization mode of the view in the 3D Viewer ie in the 3D windows and in the background of each view in every 2D context.

method.name: Weldings
method.abstract: Returns the drawing welding collection of the Layout2D view.

method.name: x
method.abstract: Returns or sets the x coordinate of the Layout2D view coordinate system origin.

method.name: y
method.abstract: Returns or sets the y coordinate of the Layout2D view coordinate system origin.

method.name: AddAuxiliary
method.abstract: Creates a section or section-cut or auxiliary View2DL from a given Layout View2DL.

method.name: AddDetail
method.abstract: Creates a detail view and adds it to the layout view collection.

method.name: AddFrom3DPlane
method.abstract: Creates a viewFrom3D View2DL with the given 3Dplane as its view plane at the given position in the given Sheet2DL.

method.name: AddPrimary
method.abstract: Creates a Layout view and adds it to the Layout view collection.

method.name: AddRelated
method.abstract: Creates a projection or isometric Layout View2DL from a given View2DL.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a Layout2D view using its index or its name from the Layout2DViews collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a layout2D view from the Layout2DViews collection.

method.name: ActiveView
method.abstract: Returns the active Layout2D view of the active Layout2D sheet.
